      • addAllGames

        public java.lang.Boolean addAllGames(java.util.List<GameData> games,
                                     java.lang.String userID)
        Adds a list of games to the database, used once for new users that don't have any data in database yet-
        Parameters:
        games - List of game data (from Steam).
        userID - Steam userID
        Returns:
        success returns true, fail returns false

        Returns:
